version_description:
1. Added Chapter 9
2. Added Association Commision 1&2
3. Added new clothes: White Demon, Sly Angel, Lunar Angel, Sugar Cheerleader and so on
4. Added new events: the Sixth Clinic, Moon Festival and so on
5. Fixed some bugs
6. Optimized

1. Brand new chapter 11 revealing the outcome of Fantasy Competition
2. Polished text
3. Improved game resource loading speed
4. Other bug fixes
